siteMetadata.description: This is the personal site for Troy Rosenberg - engineering manager and develop. This serves as a place to store blog posts that are generally about technology. Topics may include - Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, Phoenix, JavaScript, TypeScript, Node, project management, engineering mangement, and more!
